definition.text: The Discord Bot node is used for defining the configuration for a Discord Bot. This bot allows Superalgos to send announcements to a Discord Channel.

paragraphs.text: In order to use the Discord Bot, you will need to create a new Webhook Integration in Discord. The only configuration that is required within Superalgos is the webhookURL.
- webhookURL - required - obtained from Integrations > Webhooks in the channel settings.
- format - optional - allows custom formatting of the message being sent into Discord.
- `%{EXCHANGE}` the exchange which is operating, i.e. Binance
- `%{MARKET}` the market which is operating. i.e. BTC/USDT
Which results in a final message in Discord that looks like:
"Binance BTC/USDT: Backtesting Session 'Lightning Strike' is starting."
